creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs George Haldeman
description: fourteen lines, alternating between lines of two and one character; one fan fold space between last two lines (signature); small rectangular intaglio stamp URC; small square intaglio stamp ULC; small relief stamp L center
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio seal; ULC, square intaglio seal; L center, square relief seal; on back, LRQ, in pencil: [Tetto]
title: Poem
